fig.label: Fig. 1

caption.p: Phylogenetic trees obtained for the three genomic segments RNA1, RNA2 and RNA3, by concatenating coding and non-coding regions and fitting a heterogeneous nucleotide-substitution model using CODEML. See Table 2 for virus names and abbreviations. The three trees have been aligned with a color-coded system for each genus to show similitudes and differences.

fig.attrib: The trees are reproduced from Codoner, F.M., Elena, S.F., 2008. The promiscuous evolutionary history of the family Bromoviridae. Journal of General Virology 89, 1739â€“1747 with permission (modified by C. Fauquet).
